description: In 1989, both the Pop and R&B charts were absolutely dominated by a young group from Boston, the New Kids on the Block. To some they were the best thing since sliced bread, to others a living nightmare. Now, for the first time ever, all the hits on one DVD! Videos included: "Step By Step," "You Got It (The Right Stuff)," "I'l Be Loving You (Forever)," "Cover Girl," "Didn't I (Blow Your Mind)," "Please Don't Go Girl," "Tonight," "This One's for the Children," "Valentine Girl," "Call It What You Want," "If You go Away" DVD-only bonus tracks: "No More Games," "Tonight," "Step By Step".
